title: Radical

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, shoot a player. 3 charges.
- If you shoot a player with the same faction as your target, you lose all charges and commit suicide.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you're given a target. You aren't told their role or faction, just their name.
- If your target dies at night, your target's killer is your new target. If they were killed by multiple people, a random killer is chosen. Your Destiny's progress resets if this happens.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Prevent your target from dying for 4 nights.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
